title: One Click Feeds
name: one-click-feeds
description: Firefox extension to open feedly feeds as tabs in one click.
author: kumar biswaranjan

preferences.name: blacklists
preferences.title: Comma separated blacklisted urls. Any url starts with these, the tabs will not be opened and will be marked as read in feedly.

preferences.name: maxlinks
preferences.title: Max number of links to be opened at one click.
